name: Keyboard Warrior: Dreamstate
description:
Wield Your Mouse As a Weapon.




Unlock Your Inner Warrior




Wield Unlimited Power




Plan Then Pounce




Make Your Own Build




Fight Intelligent Enemies





Built-in Speedrunning Mode (with Global Leaderboards)




General Tips:

  • Your special meter carries across between levels and areas, don't use it if you don't have to.
  • You can't complete every level at once, pick the levels you need.
  • If a certain level is getting the best of you, don't be afraid to switch your cursor or passive.



Important:

  • Keyboard Warrior: Dreamstate DOES NOT CURRENTLY SUPPORT A CONTROLLER
  • This game is very clicking intense. If you have any serious wrist or forearm problems on your clicking hand, DO NOT PURCHASE.
